name: free_games
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool epic_games_store_free_games.
Tool description: Unofficial API for scraping Free Games Offers from the Epic Games Store
API description: Returns all free games currently on offer and upcoming free games from the Epic Games Store.

country.description: Country code for local offers (e.g., 'US', 'DE', 'ES'). Defaults to 'US'.
